title: Indian Penal Code - Criminal Complaint
description: Template for filing a criminal complaint under the Indian Penal Code

complainant_name.label: Complainant's Name
complainant_name.description: Full name of the person filing the complaint

accused_name.label: Accused's Name
accused_name.description: Full name of the accused person

accused_address.label: Accused's Address
accused_address.description: Address of the accused person (if known)

applicable_sections.label: Applicable IPC Sections
applicable_sections.description: Relevant sections of IPC that were violated

content:
IN THE COURT OF THE CHIEF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE AT [COURT_LOCATION]

Criminal Complaint No. _______ of [YEAR]

IN THE MATTER OF:

{{complainant_name}}
R/o: {{complainant_address}}
...COMPLAINANT

VERSUS

{{accused_name}}
R/o: {{accused_address}}
...ACCUSED

COMPLAINT UNDER SECTION {{applicable_sections}} OF THE INDIAN PENAL CODE

MOST RESPECTFULLY SHOWETH:

1. That the Complainant is a law-abiding citizen of India, residing at the above-mentioned address.

2. That the accused is also residing at the above-mentioned address.

3. That on {{incident_date}}, at {{incident_place}}, the following incident occurred:

{{incident_description}}

4. That the above-mentioned acts of the accused constitute offence(s) under Section {{applicable_sections}} of the Indian Penal Code.

5. That this Hon'ble Court has jurisdiction to try and entertain this complaint.

PRAYER:

It is, therefore, most respectfully prayed that this Hon'ble Court may be pleased to:

a) Take cognizance of this complaint and proceed against the accused for the offence(s) mentioned above;
b) Pass any other order which this Hon'ble Court may deem fit and proper in the interest of justice.

Place: [LOCATION]
Date: [CURRENT_DATE]

COMPLAINANT
{{complainant_name}}

VERIFICATION:

Verified at [LOCATION] on this [DATE] that the contents of the above complaint are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.

COMPLAINANT
{{complainant_name}}
